'''''Mythlore'' 44''' ([https://dc.swosu.edu/mythlore/vol11/iss4/ Volume 12, Issue 2]) is an issue of the ''[[Mythlore]]'' journal, published by the [[Mythopoeic Society]].

==Contents==

This is one of several short supplemental issues that ''Mythlore'' published in order to comply with bulk mailing permit regulations.  This issue mainly consisted of information about the upcoming 1986 and 1987 Mythopoeic Conferences and a preview of the next issue.
